name: CENTRAL PUGET SOUND REGIONAL TRANSIT
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to local project planning and finance. Funding to support surface transportation programs. Issues related to Federal Transit Administration (FTA) grant programs. FTA New Starts. Issues related to the Transportation Infrastructure Finance Innovation Act program. Implementation of Fixing America's Surface Transportation Act (P.L. 114-94). PTC implementation. FY20 Budget Submission. Implementation of Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2018 (P.L. 115-141). Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2019 (P.L. 116-6) implementation. FY20 House Transportation, Housing and Urban Development, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act (P.L. 116-94). Senate Transportation, Housing and Urban Development, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act (P.L. 116-94).

FY20 funding for full funding grant agreements. Issues related to competitive grant opportunities for transit organizations (Department of Transportation). FY20 Budget submission. Implementation of Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2018 (P.L. 115-141). Consolidated Appropriations Act 2019 (P.L. 116-6) implementation. FY19 Apportionments for Capital Investment Grants. FY20 House Transportation, Housing and Urban Development, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act (P.L. 116-94). Senate Transportation, Housing and Urban Development, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act (P.L. 116-94).

Issues related to competitive grant opportunities for transit organizations (Department of Transportation). FY21 Presidents Budget Request. FY21 Transportation, Housing and Urban Development Appropriations. FY20 Capital Investment Grants apportionments. CARES Act (P.L. 116-136). FY20 Transportation Appropriations (P.L. 116-94) implementation.
